name: Lama Drama FPS
description:
Lama Drama FPS is an intense, fast-pace and pretty hardcore shooter game. It is fun, easy to learn and addicting. Defeat the evil lamas, survive countless waves of enemies and break your highscore. Will you be able to survive the lama rampage?

So whats going on?
  • All the lamas on the lama farm went on killing spree! We need to stop them before it is too late.
  • 3 different levels
  • A big selection of different weapons
  • Basically infinte exploding lamas
  • Enemies grow over time
  • Fun game design
  • A fast, intuitive and very addicting gameplay
  • Defeat the mad lama army
  • Beat your highscore
  • Survive the lama rampage
